CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(FirstName),'', 'first_name=' & FirstName) & '&last_name=' & LastName & '&email=' & Email & IF((MailingStreet == '' || MailingStreet == NULL),'', '&address=' & MailingStreet) & IF((MailingCity == '' || MailingCity == NULL),'', '&city=' & MailingCity ) & IF((MailingState == '' || MailingState == NULL),'', '&state=' & MailingState) & IF((MailingPostalCode == '' || MailingPostalCode == NULL),'', '&zip=' & MailingPostalCode)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field pulling in user contact information for the encrypted query string. Part of the SpringBoard package.
CustomField.label: Query String
